question: Which one of the following nitrate will decompose to give <katex>$NO_{2}$</katex> on heating?
explanation: Alkali metal nitrates usually decompose to give nitrites and oxygen, except for Lithium nitrate (<katex>$LiNO_3$</katex>). Due to the small size of <katex>$Li^+$</katex> and high polarizing power, it decomposes to form lithium oxide, nitrogen dioxide (<katex>$NO_2$</katex>), and oxygen.
